page.title: 13MY FAVOURITE HOBBY
page.content: My favourite hobby is collecting marbles,marbles are little round glass balls with a bit of colour inside.I have 4,506 marbles.My favourite marble is my Kingsy Clearsy, (which is a marble a bit smaller than an Emperor which is the biggest marble you can get.Its as big as the top of an inkwell. Myself,Alistair. I,m 10 years old and I collect all kinds of soldiers and army vehicles.army vehicles and toy soldiers are models of warfare which fight all our battles.We set them up and take it in turns to shoot each others men.We play a game where you have a dice and a ruler.If you get a six you can kill four men,take a prisoner or destroy a tank and so on down to one.
